resources.string: Heads held high we clinch victory

Karakoram residence was established in the year 1965 and for over 50 years it has withstood all the challenges that came in it pursuit of success. Generations and Generations, the ceilings of this humble abode saw a change in faces but never a change in their hearts that always strode to put Karakoram on the top. This app is a dream of a group of such residents who wish to digitise the obsolete methods of the past and hence bring further comfort and ease to others in their endeavors. Thank you for using this app. Sarvashretham Sarvasundaram, Karakoram, Karakoram
We collect the college registered name, entry number and hostel room number of the resident only.
The complaints submitted will be visible only to the admins. The anonymity of the mess feedback will be followed according to the selected anonymity level by the resident.
While the anonymity of the data will be maintained strictly, no data is hidden from the developers. Any misconduct can be tracked to the source
